医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
UVA 借助 Komen 资助推进精准医学战胜乳腺癌通过精准医学，弗吉尼亚大学正在努力实现一个不再需要粉红丝带的世界。为此，Susan G. Komen 今年夏天宣布支持 UVA 工程与应用科学学院应用系统生物学研究来战胜乳腺癌的努力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/UVA-advances- precision-medicine-to-defeat-breast-cancer-with-Komen-grant.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/UVA-advances- precision-medicine-to-defeat-breast-cancer-with-Komen-grant.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd487afd-9ac7-437c-878e-8946f68f039a Fri, 19 Jul 2024 21:49:00 -0400 UVA advances precision medicine to defeat breast cancer with Komen grant
在 COVID-19 大流行期间，印度的预期寿命出现了大幅且不平等的下降这项由社会学系和 Leverhulme 人口科学中心的 Aashish Gupta 博士和 Ridhi Kashyap 教授共同撰写的国际研究表明，在 COVID-19 大流行期间，印度的预期寿命出现了大幅且不平等的下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Life-expectancy-in-India-suffered-large-and-unequal-declines-during-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Life-expectancy-in-India-suffered-large-and-unequal-declines-during-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cd3ef8c7-28d0-4711-8041-cb96d6e76a63 Fri, 19 Jul 2024 21:42:00 -0400 Life expectancy in India suffered large and unequal declines during COVID-19 pandemic
马歇尔大学获得 330 万美元资助，用于研究芬太尼成瘾背后的遗传机制马歇尔大学获得了国家药物滥用研究所 (NIDA) 的 330 万美元拨款 (#R01DA057931)，用于研究芬太尼成瘾的遗传机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Marshall-University-receives-2433-million-grant-to-examine-genic-mechanisms-behind-fentanyl-addiction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Marshall-University-receives-2433-million-grant-to-examine-genic-mechanisms-behind-fentanyl-addiction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39154f44-d4df-4893-8149-64e731f406e4 Fri, 19 Jul 2024 21:36:00 -0400 Marshall University receives $3.3 million grant to examine genetic mechanisms behind fentanyl addiction
钩端螺旋体病研究揭示了疾病传播的关键因素螺旋状钩端螺旋体及其引起的潜在致命疾病很难研究。这些细菌生活在动物的肾脏中，它们可能会或可能不会引起症状，并且每当宿主小便时，它们很容易释放到环境中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Leptospirosis-research-uncovers-key-factors-in-disease-transmission.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Leptospirosis-research-uncovers-key-factors-in-disease-transmission.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1054f271-b64b-4102-bc57-ad704adf50a3 Fri, 19 Jul 2024 21:29:00 -0400 Leptospirosis research uncovers key factors in disease transmission
RSV 免疫逃避关键机制的发现为新疗法带来了希望由都柏林三一学院的一个团队领导的爱尔兰科学家发现了危险的呼吸道合胞病毒 (RSV) 如何消除我们的免疫反应，并在此过程中为药物开发人员确定了一个令人兴奋的新目标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Discovery-of-key-RSV-immune-evasion-mechanism-offers-hope-for-new-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Discovery-of-key-RSV-immune-evasion-mechanism-offers-hope-for-new-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=715cff5f-20da-4019-bd69-6a71e558c4fa Fri, 19 Jul 2024 21:22:00 -0400 Discovery of key RSV immune evasion mechanism offers hope for new treatments
发现腺病毒 COVID-19 疫苗出现意外 T 细胞反应利物浦大学药物安全科学中心的研究人员发现，腺病毒（牛津/阿斯利康和杨森）COVID-19 疫苗会产生不可预测的 T 细胞免疫反应，但 mRNA 疫苗则不会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Unexpected-T-cell-reactions-to-adenoviral-COVID-19-vaccines-discovered-Researchers-From-The-U.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Unexpected-T-cell-reactions-to-adenoviral-COVID-19-vaccines-discovered-Researchers-From-The-U.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=107c5f29-ecbf-491c-97c0-412dfb5926d1 Fri, 19 Jul 2024 21:15:00 -0400 Unexpected T-cell reactions to adenoviral COVID-19 vaccines discovered
新显微镜技术揭示了β淀粉样蛋白的动态结构β 淀粉样蛋白 (A-β) 聚集体是蛋白质缠结物，与阿尔茨海默氏症等神经退行性疾病密切相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/New-microscopy-technique-unveils-dynamic-struct-of-amyloid-beta.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/New-microscopy-technique-unveils-dynamic-struct-of-amyloid-beta.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b3db0a96-6f1a-42d0-b74e-c3767f4ceb2c Fri, 19 Jul 2024 21:07:00 -0400 New microscopy technique unveils dynamic structure of amyloid-beta
拜登政府收紧经纪人对healthcare.gov的访问，以阻止流氓注册拜登政府周五实施了严格的限制措施，旨在阻止流氓保险经纪人在未经消费者同意的情况下改变消费者的平价医疗法案计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Biden-Administration-Tightens-Broker-Access-To-HealthcareGov-To-Thwart-Rogue-Sign-Ups.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Biden-Administration-Tightens-Broker-Access-To-HealthcareGov-To-Thwart-Rogue-Sign-Ups.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2873e28-70ec-45ef-9883-4512ec3c23e6 Fri, 19 Jul 2024 20:57:00 -0400 Biden administration tightens broker access to healthcare.gov to thwart rogue sign-ups
研究深入了解监禁对青少年健康的影响研究员萨曼莎·博赫十多年来一直在研究监禁对儿童和家庭健康的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Study-offers-insight-into-incarcerations-toll-on-youth-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Study-offers-insight-into-incarcerations-toll-on-youth-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6374a401-1c48-4d8f-b8df-5fce4e6e7dea Fri, 19 Jul 2024 20:55:50 -0400 Study offers insight into incarceration's toll on youth health
研究可能为腹膜假粘液瘤患者的全身靶向治疗铺平道路由赫克托·G·帕尔默 (Héctor G. Palmer) 领导的瓦尔德希伯伦肿瘤研究所 (VHIO) 干细胞和癌症小组的研究人员领导的一项临床前研究结果发表在《临床癌症研究》上，为假粘液瘤患者的全身靶向治疗铺平了道路腹膜癌，一种罕见的癌症，可用的治疗选择很少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Research-may-pave-the-way-for-systemic-targeted-therapy-for-病人-with-pseudomyxoma-peritonei.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Research-may-pave-the-way-for-systemic-targeted-therapy-for-病人-with-pseudomyxoma-peritonei.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e0974737-7c45-4c4a-a204-761c424b6ae0 Fri, 19 Jul 2024 20:19:35 -0400 Research may pave the way for systemic targeted therapy for patients with pseudomyxoma peritonei
